nodes.text: The Duel on Rattatak was a brief skirmish between Jedi Padawan Anakin Skywalker and the Dark Jedi Asajj Ventress in the Rattatak arena known as The Cauldron. After a fierce lightsaber duel, Anakin eventually defeated the Dathomirian assailant.

This duel only appeared in the flash game Star Wars: Clone Wars: Planetary Forces. Since the other events covered in the game (The Battle of Muunilinst and the Battle of Mon Calamari) occurred around the same time, and the Duel on Yavin 4 took place during the later stages of the former, its canonicity is ambiguous.
